Package io.github.projectunified.minelib.plugin.listener

Interface ListenerComponent

All Superinterfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener, Loadable
public interface ListenerComponent extends Loadable, org.bukkit.event.Listener
A component that registers and unregisters itself as a Listener. Plugin listeners should extend this class and register their events.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    default void
    disable()
    Called when the component is disabled

    enable()
    Called when the component is enabled

  • Method Details

    • getPlugin

      default org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin getPlugin()
      Get the plugin that this listener is associated with. You may override this method to return a different plugin, in case that the listener is not in the same plugin.

      the plugin
